title: Customer Schema
description: Data schema to define a customer or legal entity related to a financial product or transaction.

annual_debit_turnover.description: The annual debit turnover in the business account of the entity. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

clearing_threshold.description: Status of the clearing threshold as defined in EMIR

df_ccp.description: The pre-funded financial resources of the CCP in accordance with Article 50c of Regulation (EU) No 648/2012

df_cm.description: The sum of pre-funded contributions of all clearing members of the QCCP in accordance with Article 50c of Regulation (EU) No 648/2012.

incurred_cva.description: The amount of credit valuation adjustements being recognised by the institution as an incurred write-down, calculated without taking into account any offsetting debit value adjustment attributed to the firm's own credit risk, that has been already excluded from own funds.

k_ccp.description: Hypothetical capital of the QCCP in accordance with Article 50c of Regulation (EU) No 648/2012

product_count.description: The number of active products/trades this customer has with the firm.

risk_profile.description: The evaluation of the customer's willingness and/or capacity to take on financial risk.

start_date.description: The date that the customer first became a customer. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

status.description: The status of the relationship with the customer from the firm's point of view.
